name: lyricnote-monorepo
description: 🎌 LyricNote - 专注日语歌曲的AI智能听歌识曲应用

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:mobile && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.devdb:generate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma generate
scripts.devdb:push: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma db push
scripts.devdb:migrate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.devdb:seed: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npm run db:seed
scripts.devdb:studio: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma studio --port 5555
scripts.devdb:reset: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.prodb:generate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma generate
scripts.prodb:push: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma db push
scripts.prodb:migrate: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prodb:seed: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npm run db:seed
scripts.prodb:studio: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma studio --port 5556
scripts.prodb:status: cd packages/backend && dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma migrate status
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup

author: LyricNote Team
